Salinas.Confederate Corners, California:
Confederate Corners (formerly, Springtown and Spring Town) is a populated place in the unincorporated Monterey County, California. The name is not widely known or used in the community, yet remains listed as such by the Geographic Names Information System, USGS.
It is located 2 miles (3.2 km) south-southwest of Salinas, on California State Route 68. The elevation is 52 feet (16 m).
